attributes.action: allow parents who are students to claim income support until their child leaves education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone who is on income support (rather than job seekers allowance) is studying through a further education establishment, including the open university, they should be able to continue to receive income support until they have completed their full qualification or their child leaves full time education. This would allow those who are studying for degrees to complete them without having to rely on student loans to live on.
